entry.title: Owncloud 7 - customize mail messages
entry.summary:
OwnCloud 7 came packed with lots of new features. Many happy users of OwnCloud uses it as file transfer solution (me including).

The default mail message sent to the user receiving the file is a bit unformal and is considered unpolite. It starts Hey there. How to change the message?

The good news is file is stored in core/templates/mail.php (HTML version) and core/templates/altmail.php (plain text version). mc If you change that templates, the messages can be a bit more polite.

This is default Czech message, starting with: Hey there!

This is customized message starting with Good afternoon

entry.title: Owncloud 7 - upgrade from 6
entry.summary:
OwnCloud 7 is here for more than three months (changelog). How to upgrade from OwnCloud 6?

The good news: it's easy.

  • Make backups
  • Download .tar.gz package and extract it
  • Copy owncloud6/config/config.php to owncloud7/config/config.pjp
  • Run migration tasks by: sudo -u apache php occ upgrade
